mapper.select: select idx, writer, memo, post_date from memo where ${searchkey} like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by idx desc
select idx, writer, memo, post_date from memo where writer like '%' || #{search} || '%' or memo like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into memo (idx, writer, memo) values((select nvl(max(idx) + 1, 1) from memo), #{writer}, #{memo} )
